channel.title: Community on Open Cluster Management
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Open Cluster Management

item.title: Releases
item.description: Open Cluster Management has approximately a three to four month release cycle. The current release is v0.4.0. Continue reading to view upcoming releases: v0.5.0 on November 2021 v0.4.0 on August 2021

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: The Open Cluster Management community uses GitHub Project to track the progress of the project.
